rows.field_59496: Conduct onboarding for a new hire, including setting up payroll in the HR system, scheduling a welcome meeting with the team, providing access to company tools, and assigning required training materials.
Process and approve five supplier invoices by verifying amounts, ensuring correct account allocation, obtaining necessary approvals, and scheduling payment in the financial system.
Write, design, and schedule three social media posts promoting the company’s latest product update, ensuring alignment with brand guidelines and marketing strategy.
Resolve 15 customer support tickets by diagnosing issues, providing solutions, updating ticket statuses, and following up to ensure customer satisfaction.
Break down an upcoming project into five key tasks, assign them to team members, set deadlines in the project management system, and communicate expectations to stakeholders.
Install security patches and update software on all employee workstations, ensuring compatibility, testing functionality, and documenting changes for compliance.
Conduct a physical inventory count of all high-value products, compare results with digital records, report discrepancies, and update the inventory management system.
Follow up with five potential clients via email or phone, answer questions, provide additional information, and schedule meetings to move them through the sales pipeline.
Review and update one company policy by assessing current regulations, identifying gaps, revising wording, obtaining approval, and publishing the final version.
Conduct one-on-one performance reviews with three employees, discuss achievements and challenges, document feedback, and outline action steps for improvement.

fields.name: Desired start date
fields.formula: todate(if(and(field('Is urgent'),field('Is high priority')),today(),if(and(field('Is urgent'),not(field('Is high priority'))),today() + date_interval('1 day'),if(and(not(field('Is urgent')),field('Is high priority')),today() + date_interval('3 days'),''))),'YYYY-MM-DD')
